title: Client not working in apple OS 10.7.5
body:
Help Riot, I was using a apple OS 10.7.5 system to play league of legends in my macbook. Last week there is a new update in league of legends, I accept the update, 1 minute later I can't open league of legends. I tried to restart the computer many times but still not working! I decided to reinstall league of legends but can't open the application.
Riot, I love league of legends but you must help me fix this problem!
Thank you for reading!

replies.body:
Riot doesn't care about the Mac users. Most likely they'll tell you to check their "connection issues" guide, and then they'll tell you to try the Hextech Repair Tool. After that, they pretty much ignore the problem.

I have the same problem.
Is the Hextech Repair tool work actually?

I'm not 100% sure yet just what is causing these Mac issues, but I have had some feedback from players that [**updating to the latest MacOS**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1) was able to fix their login troubles. If you're not able to grab that update due to how old your macbook is, check out the steps in [**this guide**](https://www.lifewire.com/can-i-fix-application-thats-not-starting-2260192) as well.

Let me know if either of those options help to get you back on the Rift, and if not hit me back so that we can try a few other things!

I am using the macbook 2011, so I am afraid I cannot take rise to update the latest MacOS.
P.S Riot plz fix the downloading system because I downloaded the old client, so plz I need to download the new client instead of the old one.
